data.name: Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing
data.detailed_description:
Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy game featuring a story rich campaign and online competitive play, all controlled by typing. A streamlined RTS design coupled with the extra layer of multitasking from the innovative typing control system, Touch Type Tale offers a fresh experience for RTS veterans and newcomers alike. With the throne left unclaimed and barbarians at the gates, an unlikely hero will emerge to save the kingdom.


No micromanagement, bloated tech trees or excessive unit stats, Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy game that tests your skills in a whole new way.


Defeat the evil and save the kingdom, live the underdog story of an unlikely hero in the single player story campaign.


Engage in chivalrous competition like the Knights of old in online multiplayer.


Touch Type Tale is a real-time strategy game with a typing twist. The extra layer of multitasking and different skill set offers a fresh experience for RTS-veterans and newcomers alike.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
